message: Mentioned by @A1Ari at the meeting, thought I'd bring it into the Convore
Slinky made two light-up slinkys.  Here is one: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fkKKRdJCosA
I have some ideas on implementation, but I'd be happy to let someone else take this on as a problem-solving challenge.
Ok, my only concern was the weight of the batteries / transformer.  After seeing the video though, I see you can just counterweight it.  Cool
